installation.script:
# Downloads SteamCMD
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates wget
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

# Extracts SteamCMD
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt

# Downloads the server
export HOME=/mnt/server
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 996560 +quit

# Hoster policy
echo 'gamedir_for_configs: true' >> /mnt/server/hoster_policy.txt
chmod +x /mnt/server/hoster_policy.txt

# Downloads MultiAdmin
URL=$(curl https://api.github.com/repos/Grover-c13/MultiAdmin/releases/latest | grep browser_download_url | cut -d '"' -f 4)
wget -P /mnt/server/ $URL
chmod +x /mnt/server/MultiAdmin.exe

# Compatibility fix for MultiAdmin
echo "use_new_input_system: false" >> /mnt/server/scp_multiadmin.cfg
echo "max_players: 20" >> /mnt/server/scp_multiadmin.cfg
